derivation: neuter of the comparative of the same as G3122 (μᾶλλον);
kjv_def: + better, X far, (the) more (and more), (so) much (the more), rather
strongs_def: (adverbially) more (in a greater degree)) or rather
outline:
1. more, to a greater degree, rather
    1. much, by far
    2. rather, sooner
    3. more willingly, more readily, sooner
